meanings.definition: Decorated with convex curves or knobs.
meanings.sent1: The gadrooned vase had beautiful rounded patterns.
meanings.sent2: The gadrooned edges of the table added an elegant touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The gadrooned frame around the mirror made it look like a royal treasure.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was gadrooned with intricate designs that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The gadrooned patterns on the ceiling created a mesmerizing effect in the room.

meanings.definition: Having a raised, rounded design or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The gadrooned handle of the cup fit perfectly in her hand.
meanings.sent2: The gadrooned surface of the cake made it look too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent3: The gadrooned texture of the fabric felt soft and luxurious.
meanings.sent4: The gadrooned details on the door gave it a classic and elegant look.
meanings.sent5: The gadrooned patterns on the rug added a cozy feel to the room.

meanings.definition: Adorned with a series of convex curves or knobs.
meanings.sent1: The gadrooned crown sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: The gadrooned border on the painting enhanced its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The gadrooned design on the cake made it a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The gadrooned patterns on the curtains gave the room a regal look.
meanings.sent5: The gadrooned details on the dress made it stand out at the party.
